chunks.zh: 你们心中可以封神的音乐有哪些?
chunks.en: What music can be considered legendary in your hearts?

chunks.zh:
我先来吧:  
- 雅尼的 Nightingale 和 with an orchid  
- The truth that you leave
- Annie's Wonderland
- 风居住的街道
- Windy hill
chunks.en:
Let me start: 
- Yanni's Nightingale and with an orchid
- The truth that you leave
- Annie's Wonderland
- The Street Where the Wind Dwells
- Windy hill

chunks.zh: 庆丰话
chunks.en: Qingfeng dialect

chunks.zh: YMCA
chunks.en: YMCA

chunks.zh: 巴赫无伴奏大提琴组曲
chunks.en: Bach Cello Suites

chunks.zh: 蓝色多瑙河
chunks.en: The Blue Danube

chunks.zh: Stairway to heaven
chunks.en: Stairway to Heaven

chunks.zh: 面会菜，我把白宝山的纪录片配上这个音乐，看的我都同情命运对白宝山的不公，你说神不神，快去搜搜看，你们绝对听过
chunks.en: Mian Hui Cai, I paired the Bai Baoshan documentary with this music, and I felt sorry for the injustice of fate towards Bai Baoshan. Is it legendary? Go search and see, you have definitely heard it.

chunks.zh: 最终幻想 10-2 的 久远~光与波的记忆
chunks.en: Final Fantasy 10-2's Kuon ~Memories of Light and Waves~

chunks.zh: 马勒第一号交响曲马勒第二号交响曲马勒第三号交响曲马勒第四号交响曲马勒第五号交响曲马勒第六号交响曲马勒第七号交响曲马勒第八号交响曲马勒第九号交响曲此外还有贝五贝七贝九，百听不厌
chunks.en: Mahler's Symphony No. 1, Mahler's Symphony No. 2, Mahler's Symphony No. 3, Mahler's Symphony No. 4, Mahler's Symphony No. 5, Mahler's Symphony No. 6, Mahler's Symphony No. 7, Mahler's Symphony No. 8, Mahler's Symphony No. 9, and also Beethoven's 5th, 7th, and 9th. I never tire of listening to them.

chunks.zh: 童年神曲,  做一晚泥水工
chunks.en: Childhood classic, Be a Mud Worker for One Night

chunks.zh: 后来雅尼我最喜欢的其实是 Within Attraction
chunks.en: Later, my favorite Yanni piece is actually Within Attraction.

chunks.zh: 加州招待所
chunks.en: Hotel California

chunks.zh: titanic 系列my heart will go on.rose.hymn to the sea.forever live 版- stratovarius地尽头-关淑怡三千年前-关淑怡，李香琴
chunks.en: Titanic series: my heart will go on, rose, hymn to the sea, forever live version - Stratovarius, End of the Earth - Shirley Kwan, Three Thousand Years Ago - Shirley Kwan, Lee Heung Kam

chunks.zh: ShotsViva La Vida
chunks.en: Shots Viva La Vida

chunks.zh: 孙燕姿 的 我不难过 雨天 ，陪我 20 年了快
chunks.en: Stefanie Sun's Wo Bu Nan Guo (I'm Not Sad) and Yu Tian (Rainy Day) have been with me for almost 20 years.

chunks.zh: 黑夜中 出现又离开 曾经是情侣 日落大道 我不知道
chunks.en: Appears and disappears in the night, used to be lovers, Sunset Boulevard, I don't know

chunks.zh: 孙燕姿的 遇见 梁静茹的 情歌
chunks.en: Stefanie Sun's Yu Jian (Encounter), Fish Leong's Qing Ge (Love Song)

chunks.zh: 波西米亚狂想曲
chunks.en: Bohemian Rhapsody

chunks.zh: 长亭外，古道边，芳草碧连天
chunks.en: Outside the long pavilion, beside the ancient road, the fragrant grass connects to the horizon.

chunks.zh: 大佛 plus  《面会菜》
chunks.en: The Great Buddha+  Mian Hui Cai

chunks.zh: ditto
chunks.en: ditto
